# SweetAlert2 Local Installation

## Download Instructions

1. Download SweetAlert2 from: https://github.com/sweetalert2/sweetalert2/releases
2. Extract the files and copy:
   - `sweetalert2.all.min.js` to this directory (`public/js/vendor/`)
   - `sweetalert2.min.css` to `public/js/vendor/css/`

Or use npm:
```bash
npm install sweetalert2
```
Then copy from `node_modules/sweetalert2/dist/`:
- `sweetalert2.all.min.js` → `public/js/vendor/`
- `sweetalert2.min.css` → `public/js/vendor/css/`

## Files Required:
- `public/js/vendor/sweetalert2.all.min.js`
- `public/js/vendor/css/sweetalert2.min.css`
